sections.title: Core JavaScript Concepts
sections.content:
JavaScript is a versatile programming language with key features like variables, functions, and objects.

  • Variables store data using let, const, var
  • Functions are reusable blocks of code
  • Objects group related data and functionality

sections.title: React Components
sections.content:
React components are the building blocks of React applications.

  • Function components are modern and preferred
  • Props pass data between components
  • State manages component data

preview.html: Hello, John

sections.title: Border CSS
sections.content: La propriété border en CSS permet de définir les bordures d'un élément. Voici plusieurs façons de l'utiliser.

preview.html:
Border Basic
Border Radius
Border Style
Border Sides

sections.title: Flexbox Layout
sections.content:
Flexbox est un modèle de mise en page puissant pour organiser les éléments.

  • Alignement flexible des éléments
  • Distribution de l'espace
  • Ordre des éléments modifiable

preview.html:
Item 1
Item 2
Item 3

sections.title: Grid Layout
sections.content:
CSS Grid permet de créer des mises en page complexes en 2 dimensions.

  • Placement précis des éléments
  • Grilles responsives
  • Zones nommées

preview.html:
Grid Item 1
Grid Item 2

sections.title: Transitions & Animations
sections.content:
CSS transitions and animations create smooth visual effects.

  • Smooth transitions between states
  • Custom keyframe animations
  • Configurable timing and duration

preview.html: Hover me

sections.title: Media Queries
sections.content:
Les media queries permettent de créer des designs responsifs adaptés à différents écrans.

  • Breakpoints personnalisés
  • Adaptation du layout
  • Styles conditionnels

preview.html: Resize window to see changes

sections.title: Custom Properties
sections.content:
Les propriétés personnalisées (variables CSS) permettent de gérer les styles de manière dynamique.

  • Réutilisation des valeurs
  • Thèmes dynamiques
  • Maintenance simplifiée

preview.html: Themed Element

sections.title: Node.js Basics
sections.content:
Node.js enables server-side JavaScript execution.

  • Event-driven architecture
  • Non-blocking I/O operations
  • NPM package management

preview.output:
Server running at http://localhost:3000/
Hello World

sections.title: HTML Document Structure
sections.content:
HTML provides the foundation for web documents through semantic elements that give meaning and structure.

  • DOCTYPE declaration defines HTML version
  • Head section contains metadata
  • Body contains visible content

Main Heading

Page content goes here

sections.title: Navigation & Lists
sections.content:
Navigation menus and lists help organize content in a structured way.

  • Unordered and ordered lists
  • Navigation menus with links
  • Definition lists
sections.code:
• Home
  • About

sections.title: Forms & Input
sections.content:
Forms allow user input and data collection.

  • Various input types for different data
  • Form validation and submission
  • Labels for accessibility
sections.code:
<form>
  <label for="name">Name:</label>
  <input type="text" id="name" required>
  <label for="email">Email:</label>
  <input type="email" id="email">
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>

sections.title: Media Elements
sections.content:
HTML supports various media types for rich content.

  • Images with alt text
  • Figure with captions

sections.title: Advanced Form Elements
sections.code:
<form>
  <fieldset>
    <legend>Personal Info</legend>
    <input type="date" name="birth">
    <input type="color" name="favorite">
    <input type="range" min="0" max="100">
    <input type="file" accept="image/*" multiple>
    <input type="datetime-local">
    <input type="search" placeholder="Search...">
    <input type="tel" pattern="[0-9]{10}">
    <input type="url" placeholder="https://">
    <input type="week">
    <input type="time">
    <input type="month">
    <input type="number" step="0.01">
    <textarea rows="4" cols="50"></textarea>
    <select multiple>
      <optgroup label="Group 1">
        <option value="1">Option 1</option>
      </optgroup>
    </select>
    <datalist id="suggestions">
      <option value="Suggestion 1">
    </datalist>
    <output name="result"></output>
    <progress value="70" max="100"></progress>
    <meter value="0.6"></meter>
  </fieldset>
</form>

preview.html: Personal Info

sections.title: Metadata & Links
sections.code:
<head>
  <base href="https://example.com/">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width">
  <meta name="description" content="Page description">
  <meta name="keywords" content="html,css,js">
  <meta name="author" content="Author Name">
  <meta name="theme-color" content="#4285f4">
  <meta property="og:title" content="Title">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
  <link rel="icon" href="favicon.ico">
  <link rel="manifest" href="manifest.json">
  <link rel="preload" href="font.woff2" as="font">
</head>

sections.title: Advanced Forms Validation
sections.code:
<form novalidate>
  <input type="text" pattern="[A-Za-z]{3,}" title="Three or more letters" required>
  <input type="number" min="0" max="100" step="0.1">
  <input type="password" minlength="8" maxlength="20" autocomplete="new-password">
  <input type="email" multiple pattern="[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,}$">
  <input type="tel" pattern="\+?\d{1,4}?[-.\s]?\(?\d{1,3}?\)?[-.\s]?\d{1,4}[-.\s]?\d{1,4}[-.\s]?\d{1,9}">
  <input type="file" accept=".jpg,.png,.pdf" multiple capture="environment">
  <input type="date" min="2024-01-01" max="2024-12-31">
</form>

sections.title: Advanced Metadata
sections.code:
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, viewport-fit=cover">
  <meta name="color-scheme" content="dark light">
  <meta name="theme-color" media="(prefers-color-scheme: light)" content="white">
  <meta name="theme-color" media="(prefers-color-scheme: dark)" content="black">
  <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes">
  <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="black-translucent">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="https://example.com">
  <meta property="og:image" content="https://example.com/image.jpg">
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://analytics.example.com">
  <link rel="modulepreload" href="app.js">
  <link rel="manifest" href="manifest.webmanifest">
  <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="icon.png">
</head>

preview.html: <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width"> <meta name="theme-color" content="black"> ... </head>
